title: Replace image upload input with URL/link input in article form

requirements.summary: Replace the image file upload input in the AdminPage article form with a text input field that accepts an image URL. Store and display the URL string in all article rendering components.
acceptanceCriteria: The AdminPage article submission form no longer contains a file picker input for images.
A text input labeled 'Image URL' is present in the article form, accepting a URL string.
Submitting the form with a valid image URL saves the URL and the article displays using that URL as the image source.
The backend stores and returns image data as a URL string (no base64 or binary blob).
Existing article image rendering components (ArticleCard, ArticleDetailPage, etc.) continue to display images correctly using the URL field.

file_operations.description: Remove the file input state (imageFile, imagePreview) and replace with imageUrl state. Replace the file input UI (<input type='file'>) with a text input labeled 'Image URL' that accepts HTTP/HTTPS URL strings. Update the handleSubmit function to pass imageUrl (or null if empty) to the addNews mutation instead of converting a file to base64. Remove all file handling logic including readFileAsBase64.
